|{{HistoryLine||1.8|dev=Pre-release|Melon stems have an extra, unobtainable item form corresponding to its block ID. It can be obtained via inventory editors with numeric item ID 105.}}
|{{HistoryLine|java}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.2.5|dev=pre|Melon stems can now be obtained via Pick Block in creative.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.3.1|dev=12w16a|Melon stem items can now be obtained in singleplayer worlds via the {{cmd|give}} command using the respective numeric ID.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.7.2|dev=13w37a|The direct item form of melon stems has been removed from the game. It can no longer exist as an item in any way, only as a placed block.}}

|{{HistoryLine||v0.5.0|Melon stems have an extra, unobtainable item form corresponding to its block ID. It can be obtained via inventory editors with numeric item ID 105.}}
